text: Atoms for Peace is a band from California. They started in 2009. They did not have a name until February 2010. The members are Thom Yorke, Flea, Nigel Godrich, Joey Waronker, and Mauro Refosco. In February 2013, they released their first album, Amok on XL Recordings. The album charted at number 1 in nine countries. Pitchfork scored it 6.9/10. ==Other websites== *Official website ==References== Category:2009 establishments in California Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American rock bands Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles Category:Musical quintets Category:Musical groups established in 2009
title: Atoms for Peace (band)
